plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be young adult fiction, considering the user's favourite books are all aimed at a young adult audience. The user's favourite length is likely to be short, considering the user's favourite books are all novellas or novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be mental health, considering the user's favourite books all deal with this topic. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow, considering the user's favourite books all take their time to develop their characters and stories. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be linear, considering the user's favourite books all follow a chronological timeline. The user's favourite themes are likely to be self-discovery, coming-of-age, and mental health.
